WaNoTemplate.WaNoExecCommand: export NANOVER=V2 source $NANOMATCH/$NANOVER/configs/quantumpatch.config python $SHREDDERPATH/QuantumPatchAnalysis.py python $SHREDDERPATH/QuantumPatchAnalysis.py \ Morphology.structure=morphology.cml \ Morphology.parameters=morphology.spf \ Analysis.Orientation.axis.enabled=False \ Analysis.Orientation.complex_axis.enabled=False \ Analysis.Orientation.normal.enabled=False \ Analysis.QPGSP.enabled=True \ Analysis.GSP.enabled=True \ Analysis.GSP.cutoff={{ wano["Outside Box Cutoff [A]"] }} \ Analysis.GSP.do_ewald={{ 'True' if (wano["Summation Method"] == "Ewald Sum") else 'False' }} \ Analysis.GSP.do_ewald=False \ Analysis.GSP.box_size={{ wano["BoxSize (x,y) [A]"] }}
